body.name: Dr. Bronner's - Pure-Castile Bar Soap (Peppermint, 5 Ounce, 12-Pack) - Made with Organic Oils, For Face, Body & Hair, Gentle & Moisturizing, Biodegradable, Vegan, Cruelty-free, Non-GMO
features: THE GOODNESS OF OUR LIQUID SOAPS IN A BAR: Dr. Bronner's is made with only the purest certified organic oils and will leave your skin feeling soft & smooth. Our bar soaps produce a moisturizing lather for your face, body, or hair!
MADE WITH ORGANIC OILS THAT ARE GENTLE & EFFECTIVE: We don't add any chelating agents, dyes, whiteners, or synthetic fragrances—only all-natural, vegan ingredients that are gentle, effective, & mild.

NO SYNTHETIC PRESERVATIVES, DETERGENTS, OR FOAMING AGENTS: Our Pure-Castile Bar Soaps are made with plant-based ingredients you can pronounce—no synthetic preservatives, thickeners, or foaming agents—good for the environment & great for your skin!

REGENERATIVE ORGANIC CERTIFIED PALM OIL: Grown by fairly-paid farmers to ensure sustainable harvesting through intercropping, biodiversity, & reforestation—providing the smooth & creamy lather of our soaps while benefiting farmers, the planet & you.

PACKAGED IN 100% POST-CONSUMER RECYCLED WRAPPERS: Dr. Bronner's is diverting discarded paper waste from landfills by using & increasing demand for recycled materials. This prevents landfill buildup & has a positive environmental impact!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Purest Organic Ingredients No synthetic preservatives, no detergents and no foaming agents—we use only the purest organic ingredients, most of them are also fair trade ingredients! We work with fair trade suppliers to implement regenerative organic farming practices that enrich soil, increase biodiversity and help combat climate change. Farm to shelf to shower, Dr. Bronner's is building trust, health, community, wealth! Fair prices-wages-conditions for farmers, suppliers—healthy ingredients and sustainable ingredients for you! Our Certifications Truth in Labeling! No greenwashing hype! Our products are verified to the strictest industry standards— most are certified to same organic standards as food! USDA Certified Organic to ensure no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers; Fair For Life fair trade certification to verify ethical working conditions & fair prices along our entire supply chain; most products Certified Vegan; Certified Leaping Bunny to verify that none of our ingredients or products are tested on animals; B Corp Certified to measure our social and environmental performance according to an independent third-party standard. Look for the logos! Give & give! We see our company as an engine to create positive change in the world, funding & fighting for the causes we believe in: regenerative agriculture, fair trade, wage equality, animal welfare—peace on Spaceship Earth! Dr. Bronner’s caps executive salaries at 5x that of our lowest-paid full-time employees, allowing us to share profits, share talent, share muscle, share voice—give & give, fund & fight for what’s right! Sustainability at Dr. Bronner's Our guiding principles: make humble and mindful use of the Earth’s gifts—what comes from the Earth must go back! Healthy soils, healthy farms and green factories make great soap! Dr. Bronner’s works with farmers to implement regenerative organic practices. Our coconut, palm and mint oil farms in Sri Lanka, Ghana and India sequestered ~16,000 MT of CO2 —removing greenhouse gases from the environment to help mitigate climate change. Our factory is powered by renewable energy and the soap we make is completely non-toxic, preservative free, detergent free and foaming agent free! All our cylinder soap bottles are made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic. Let’s regenerate and heal earth! All-One!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gentil with a soothing peppermint smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Minty fresh. Long lasting bar. It makes me feel deliciously fresh and so clean clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell and feel
reviews.reviewText: I always have these in stock at home. I even use the liquid one for my bath tub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Only delivered 11 of 12. NOT HAPPY FOR THE PRICE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This soap is fantastic because it has a great scent, works well and is pretty much organic and vegan. I like applying it directly to my skin in the shower. I use the same brand liquid soap for shampoo and hand soap, but in a pinch you can use the bar on your head too.
